mapper.insert: insert into product_mst values( 0, #{product_brand}, #{product_kind}, #{product_name}, #{product_info}, #{product_price}, #{product_amount}, #{product_size}, 0, 0, now(), now() );
mapper.select: SELECT pm.product_code, st.size FROM product_mst pm LEFT OUTER JOIN size_mst st ON (st.product_code = pm.product_code) WHERE st.product_code = #{product_code}
